items.title: Leaving the wheelchair on the dock to row the Connecticut River
items.description: Rowing on the Connecticut River is teaching a woman with multiple sclerosis that she can get through challenges back on land, on her own.

items.title: White House says Trump has a common circulatory condition
items.description: The president underwent a comprehensive medical exam after experiencing swelling in his lower legs in recent weeks.
